parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the container cluster. For a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster, specify the cluster ID.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 99. Default value: 10.
